structure.unit: ARTICLE XVI. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY MOVING ORDINANCE

law.catch_line: Collection of freight charges on shipments involving loss or destruction in transit.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-338. Collection of freight charges on shipments involving loss or destruction in transit.
No mover shall collect, or shall require a shipper to pay, any charges when a shipper's household goods are totally lost or destroyed. The shipper shall, however, remain liable for any charges for valuation coverage, pursuant to of this Code, or any insurance premium related to the shipment for which the insurance was secured from a third party.
